about.title: About Streamyyy
about.subtitle: The ultimate multi-stream viewing experience
about.description: Streamyyy is the premier multi-stream viewer that lets you watch multiple live streams simultaneously. Whether you're following esports tournaments, keeping up with your favorite streamers, or monitoring multiple channels, we've got you covered.

hero.title: We Solved
hero.subtitle: The Problems No One Else Would
hero.description: While others built paywalls, we built bridges. While they limited you to one stream, we gave you sixteen. This is our story.

multiStream.title: Multi-Stream Viewing
multiStream.problem: Watching multiple streams means juggling multiple tabs and windows, missing important moments.
multiStream.solution: Our unified interface lets you watch up to 16 streams simultaneously with customizable layouts.

multiMonitor.title: The Multi-Monitor Myth
multiMonitor.problem: Think you need 4 monitors and a $5000 setup to watch multiple streams? That's what they want you to believe.
multiMonitor.solution: One screen, unlimited possibilities. Our smart layouts adapt to any display size. Multi-monitor setup on a laptop? Done.

tournament.title: Tournament FOMO
tournament.problem: Esports tournaments have main streams, player POVs, caster streams, and watch parties. You're missing 80% of the action.
tournament.solution: Custom tournament layouts. Watch the main broadcast, your favorite player's POV, and the best commentary all at once.

mobile.title: Mobile Streaming Prison
mobile.problem: Mobile users are second-class citizens in the streaming world. One stream at a time? In 2025? Really?
mobile.solution: Full mobile optimization with gesture controls, smart layouts, and battery-efficient streaming. Desktop power in your pocket.

platform.title: Platform Segregation
platform.problem: Your favorite creators are scattered across Twitch, YouTube, Kick, Rumble. Each platform wants you trapped in their ecosystem.
platform.solution: Platform agnostic viewing. Mix any supported platform in one view. We don't play favorites - your content, your choice.

accessibility.title: The Accessibility Challenge
accessibility.problem: Most platforms limit how many streams you can watch. Premium features are scattered across different services with varying costs.
accessibility.solution: Core multi-stream viewing accessible to everyone. Optional premium features for power users who want enhanced experiences.

noAccount.title: No Account? No Problem.
noAccount.description: Why do you need an account to watch streams? You don't. Open Streamyyy, add streams, watch. That's it. Optional sign-up for those who want to save layouts and preferences.

features.title: Features That Matter
features.description: We don't add features because we can. Every pixel, every button, every line of code has one purpose: making multi-stream viewing better. No bloat, no fluff, no corporate BS.

built.title: Built Different
built.description: We're not VC-funded. We're not chasing an exit. We're stream viewers who got tired of crappy solutions and decided to build something better. For us. For you. For everyone.

multiStream.title: Multi-Stream Viewing
multiStream.problem: Watching multiple streams means juggling multiple tabs and windows, missing important moments.
multiStream.solution: Our unified interface lets you watch up to 16 streams simultaneously with customizable layouts.

customLayouts.title: Custom Layouts
customLayouts.problem: One size doesn't fit all when it comes to viewing preferences.
customLayouts.solution: Choose from grid layouts, picture-in-picture, focus mode, and more to suit your viewing style.

realTimeSync.title: Real-Time Synchronization
realTimeSync.problem: Streams can be out of sync, making coordinated viewing difficult.
realTimeSync.solution: Our technology ensures all your streams stay synchronized for the best viewing experience.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users already using Streamyyy

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you need more
pricing.trialInfo: All plans include a 7-day free trial. Cancel anytime. No contracts.

howManyStreams.question: How many streams can I watch at once?
howManyStreams.answer: You can watch up to 16 streams simultaneously with Streamyyy. The layout automatically adjusts based on the number of streams you add.

isFree.question: Is Streamyyy free to use?
isFree.answer: Yes! Streamyyy is completely free to use. No registration, subscription, or hidden fees required.

mixPlatforms.question: Can I watch Twitch and YouTube streams together?
mixPlatforms.answer: Absolutely! You can mix streams from Twitch, YouTube, Rumble and other supported platforms in the same viewer.

mobileSupport.question: Does it work on mobile devices?
mobileSupport.answer: Yes, Streamyyy is fully responsive and optimized for phones, tablets, and desktop computers.
